dmca.title: Business of Design Designs Notice[Blogger]
dmca.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

RE: Copyright Infringement on Blogspot by user 'flyingpakedermo'

As requested in your email of March 13, 2007 being in response to my report of a copyright infringement on a Blogspot blog, I am forwarding this declaration, marked-up as required.

1. My post, dated March 8, 2007 and titled Ask jay: Getting Organised - Seven ways to get organised at http://www.businessofdesignonline.com/ask-jay-organised/ has been copied by Blogspot blogger flyingpakidermo at http://flyingpakidermo.blogspot.com/2007/03/seven-ways-to-get-organised-soomozorg.html

2. The majority of my post has been copied. The introductory Ask jay identification, 'question' and salutation has been removed.

3. Please contact me by email at [Private]@businessofdesignonline.com

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. The copyright is owner is BoDo: Business of Design online (www.businessofdesignonline.com) and me, [Private]. Neither I, nor either of my partners ([Private] and [Private]) has authorized the use, copying or display of the post described above.

5. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Please arrange for the Blogspot post as described above to be removed.

Yours sincerely,
[Private]
Systems Manager
BoDo:  Business of Design Online

cc: [Private], [Private]
